title: Energy conservation - v with half Q1 - 2E1 - 2D1

content.question: In a region of space that has a uniform electric field of magnitude <math alttext="E sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, a charged particle is accelerated from rest. The particle, Particle <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, has a positive charge <math alttext="positive uppercase Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mpadded></math> and, after traveling a distance <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> through the electric field, the particle is accelerated to a speed <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. Next a second particle, Particle <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, with charge <math alttext="uppercase Q sub 2 equals one half uppercase Q sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the same mass as Particle <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is accelerated from rest in a uniform field of magnitude <math alttext="E sub 2 equals 2 times E sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. When Particle <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has traveled a distance <math alttext="D sub 2 equals 2 times D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, what is its speed?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, times v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="the square root of 8, end root, times v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>8</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, times v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
